mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ASK_BOARD (WRITER_NM, ASK_NUM, WRITER_MAIL, ASK_TITLE, ASK_CON, COMM_YN) VALUES (#{writer_nm}, ASK_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{writer_mail}, #{ask_title}, #{ask_con}, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT ASK_NUM, ASK_TITLE, WRITER_NM, COMM_YN, INS_DT FROM (SELECT ASK_NUM, ASK_TITLE, WRITER_NM, COMM_YN, INS_DT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ASK_NUM DESC) AS RNUM FROM ASK_BOARD) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY ASK_NUM DESC
SELECT COUNT(ASK_NUM) FROM ASK_BOARD WHERE ASK_NUM > 0
